titleStmt.title: The burden of England, Scotland, & Ireland: or, The watchmans alarum. In a plain declaration to the Kings most excellent Majesty, pointing out the chiefe sins, and causes of this civill war, and of all those judgements under which the three kingdomes now groane, plainely proved by Gods Word, and our practise. Also shewing the meanes, or remedies, (approved of by God) for the establishing a sound peace, and the removing of the said judgements out of the three aforesaid kingdomes, / according to the mean wisdome God hath given unto the author, Ed: de Claro Vado.
titleStmt.author: Claro-Vado, Ed. de.
